attributes.action: resign from his office as patron of the Jewish National Fund (JNF)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The JNF owns land in Israel and the West Bank solely in the interests of Jews. As such it is a racist organisation. Mr Brown's statement on accepting the patron role that The JNF 'promote(s) charitable projects for everyone who lives in Israel' is untrue. He should therefore resign from the office.

rejection.details: This is a personal matter and not related to Mr Brown's role as Prime Minister.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
